Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: I have wanted a ramen bowl outside of Japan and Australia that packs a punch in terms of flavour and texture. Tokyo Ramen definitely delivers on both fronts! ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Atmosphere and vibe is spot on for a Ramen joint. However the chicken in the ramen was either not cooked through, or just low quality chicken as it didn‚Äôt taste good. I went with the spicy chicken ramen which was a bit mono-flavour, with ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Stumbled to this place by chance! Best ramen in Manchester, you can really tell everything is authentic and home-made. Noodles were freshly made, as well as the broth. Both delicious! ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Best bowl of ramen I've ever had from a restaurant! The service was incredible and I will definitely be coming back :) ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Stumbled upon this place on TIK TOK (I know) and glad I did the service and food was great I struggled a little using the chop sticks but that's on me. The location is good to quite central to the city centre.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Bliss  Best ramen I've had at any restaurant by far, great atmosphere and service. Thank you you have changed my life.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: I really like their broth. I can smell their broth everytime I passed. Everything is so spot on.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: We absolutely loved this place. The miso mushroom ramen was made vegan for myself, and was top notch when coupled with a peach hi-ball. Service was superb, very chatty and a sound guy. Can't wait to go back

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Great good and vibes, the staff really care about making you visit memorable, recommend the TanTan Ramen.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: The venue is only small but the ramen is mighty! Best ramen in Manchester. Be prepared to queue when it's busy, but the wait will be worth it. The menu is simple - four ramen and two side dishes when I visited - one of the ramen choices was vegetarian (the excellent mushroom-based Kinoko).

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Lovely selection of ramen and japanese drinks

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Best Ramen I've had outside of Japan. Very small menu with only 1 veggie/vegan option... But it was delicious so who needs choice!
It's a bit pricey... But when you see the presentation and the flavour they get ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Ramen, care & atmosphere.

This is the best spot I've found to enjoy ramen in all of Manchester. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Food was super good and tasty. There's no much food option but they are all good options. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Authentic Japanese Ramen in Manchester, must try

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Food - 5/5
Ambiance - 3/5
Accessibility - 2/5 ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: WOW one of the best vegan ramens I've ever had. An amazing rich mushroom broth with loads of flavour! Quick service, friendly staff, banging tunes. Reusable chopsticks would be nice for future maybe, that's it. Recommend.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Enjoyable experience, nice simple however short menu, tasty ramen (shoyru). Will be going back to taste the rest.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Coming from italy, tokyoRamen have the Best ramen of my life. Happy to have my first Manchester dinner here. Nice food, broth with amazing taste, fast service. Fried chicken good as the soup. Hope to be there one more time.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: If only talking about food, the Ramen is tasty, it is a bit different from any other Ramen restaurants, I had the vegetarian Ramen, the soup base tastes nice and special, the firmness of the noodles was just right, it wasn‚Äôt too soft and ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Manchester doesn't have a lot of ramen places but Tokyo Ramen takes the cake. The broth is thick but really tasty and the pork belly is to die for. Side dishes such as the octopus are good but a tad bit too pricey for the portion. The staff and kitchen crew are really friendly too!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Tokyo Ramen In Manchester !

Ramen , what more in life can you ask for on a rainy Manchester day ? Noodles, ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Great service, great ramen - the one with crispy chicken was amazing! Thanks guys ‚ô•Ô∏è

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Absolutely incredible food would recommend to anyone after an authentic ramen.
Service is top notch as well, janven is an absolute legend and makes you feel very at home during your time there.
Would 100% recommend!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
The menu is very short. Like, 4 types of ramen, 2 sides, and 4 drinks.
And that's how it should be. Every bowl of ramen is superb! I like the Tantan (fried chicken) bowl and the Kinoko (mushroom) bowl the most. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: The ramen here was great! We got the shoyu ramen and the tantan ramen (pictured). The noodles were nice and the broth was very tasty! I‚Äôm not a huge fan of really spicy food but the level of heat in the broth was just right! Enough to ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: If you are looking for a ramen place in Manchester, this is a MUST. I'm yet to try the other dishes from the menu but I had the Shoyu ramen myself. Absolutely delicious. You can tell they make authentic broth, noodles are spongy and everything else is just on point.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Kinoko ramen (veggie option) was incredible. The miso-mustard tare was a really unique and punchy flavour. The toppings were perfect for a mushroom lover: crispy enoki, pickled shiitake, and white shimeji mushrooms. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: AMAZING. great broth. these guys know what they are doing. gyoza were fine. thats literally the only part of the meal where i wish we had ordered more fried chicken and less gyoza. not really a bad item just the chicken was 10x better.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Great place to have a good Japanese dinner. You can come in groups of 2-8 people and they'd still be able to put tables together for you. Prices are reasonable for ramen. Great selection of drinks as well - try Calpis!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: The shop is small but pretty cool and the staff are friendly and welcoming. Personally in my humble opinion there is much to be had elsewhere in Manchester, having said that Ramen is a very personal dish so people might find the slightly lighter Tokyo broth more appealing.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Not bad but there are issues. First the good: The fried chicken was the best dish we had there. It reminded me of karaage, crunchy and enjoyable. The chicken was served with some delicious sauces. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Its a very hip little place on Church Street, near Afflecks, Manchester. I had the Tantan Ramen which was great and full of flavour! The best part, it wad topped with fried chicken. A perfect meal to have on a very cold day. The service was great, Javen the server was very helpful and always smiling üòä

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Really good Ramen well recommended.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Tried it on the opening day today as I was really unhappy with the current ramen offerings in Manchester. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Fantastic customer service and food. I love their innovation and alterations to their ramen dish, even though the ramen and food isn't traditionally Japanese. I recommend trying their fried chicken.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Lovely place. Small menu, great quality!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: If ramen in Japan is half as good as in Tokyo Ramen, then it's worth the visit! Absolutly amazing food, nice armosphere and solo-dining friendly :)

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Fantastic ramen place, just what Manchester needed. Only a small menu with 3 ramen dishes on it and some sides, that's all you need though. Will 100% be visiting again. Broth very tasty and great noodles.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: You have to appreciate the pared down menu. It promises a focus on the dishes and rapid service so that you can on your way to slurping umami heaven. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Not many options where to choose from (just 4 types of ramen), but the food was really good. So 5 stars.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Kinoko ramen was rich, moreish and satisfying

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Nice broth but the tantanmen has a special scent of spice... wish they have tonkotsu ramen one day, also the noodles are a bit too firm for me... could be better if there‚Äôs a option of firmness in the menu so that people don‚Äôt forget to mention it

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Just been there, really sorry to say that was horrible. We eat less that half meal and the waiter neither looked  our plates.
We've been asking for the bill for 20 minutes and when the waiter brought it to ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Amazing! Amazing! Amazing!  Wonderful, friendly staff.  The food was excellent.  We went for lunch and the food was so delicious we returned again for dinner.  Can‚Äôt recommend this place enough.  One of the best meals we have eaten.  Certainly will be returning.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: They use chicken bone broth so the broth is lighter than what I was expecting. I don't think it's a traditional style but it's a good meal.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Decided to have a take away with the Mrs and we were blown away with the quality and rich flavours. the staff is very chill but attentive and caring, the food is amazing and the prices are very reasonable.
If you love ramen you need to try this place out.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Amazing ramen, from the rich broth to the amazing toppings. Staff handed over the food with care, they were very friendly and we didn't have to wait long for the food. Would recommend for both price and quality.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: We ordered the octopus and it was sooooo tasty. The ramen was amazing too, we had the tantanramen and shoryu- the broth... üòçüòçüòç

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: This was an accidental find when I was walking home from work. We tried it out a few nights later and fell in love. The food is absolutely incredible, the atmosphere is chill, and the staff honestly love their job. We definitely will be back ... and often.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Great food and service was really good.  Ramen was really good and place is small so I suggest going early or expect a wait.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Lovely restaurant has great ramen, very well priced, lovely atmosphere

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: I had an amasing unch. Fantastically efficient service that was un phased by anything. We where apologetically sat at the kitchen bar (in my opinion the best seats as you can see how things are done) I will be back.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic ramen! Crispy chicken worked very well with the sesame base.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Amazing customer service and very tasty food. It was quite a small menu but they always say keep a menu small so that you can always deliver good food. Service was very quick too. 10/10 would recommend and would visit again.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Awesome place we visited during our first wedding anniversary. The staff where great and the food was top notch. Do not give them a miss.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Lovely little place. Got seated straight away. Service was fast and the food was delicious and reasonably priced. Waiting staff were charming and personable. Thoroughly recommend!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Amazing food, I just wish there were more veggie options!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Not much choice of ramen, but the options they do have are delicious.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Amazing food, great service despite the popularity of the establishment and consistently satisfying. I love it!!!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
One of, if not, the best ramen place in Manchester!

Also Janven is the man!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Ramen was slightly salty. Better ramen shops within Manchester at similar price points.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: First time at Tokyo Ramen yesterday, small food menu but it was cooked to perfection. We had the beef to start and then the fried chicken Ramen. The man who served recommended both and it very much delivered. Great service. Fun place. We will be back.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Probably the best ramen I had ever, great job guys!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Excellent ramen for a reasonable price. It‚Äôs rare I eat ramen outside of Japan but I‚Äôll be returning here for sure.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: A nice venue and small menu, but wasn't really impressed by the ramen. Didn't have much depth of flavour, and the meat was rather plain. We had the pork belly and the chicken and both dishes tasted quite bland unfortunately.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Best ramen in Mcr, with the real feel of a noodle house! Great service 100%, try the spicy ramen!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: the best service and the best ramen that I‚Äôve had. visited with friends and family each time i went into manchester before the lockdown and became my favourite place to eat, excited for when the restaurant opens back up

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Very, very good ramen. I can't imagine it gets better in Manchester. Unpretentious, high quality, service with a smile and quick; I'm sad I live in London and won't be back any time soon - it's as good as any of the offerings there. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: If I could inject the broth into my veins I would

Review Text: Second time going, incredible as with the last time. Great food, service and at a good price too.

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Review Text:
This little restaurant is one amongst the most delicious paces I've been to for a Japanese meal in Manchester.

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Great ramen. Staff are great, really friendly.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Found whilst wandering Manchester City.  Really great service and the most amazing food. Will definatly recommend and visit again

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: I had an amazing bowl of shoyu ramen topped with charred pork belly. The broth was very flavorful; ultimate umami and not too thick or too salty. The marinated egg was soft and sweet. Noodles still had bite to them. Definitely the best ramen in Manchester ‚ù§Ô∏èüçú

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Went here after reccomendation from a friend. Unfortunately it didn't live up to expectation. I eat meat but my partner is veggie. Only one option for veggies, it's a bit limited. Our meal was nice, although wasnt much ramen for a veggie ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Managed to try this place for lunch. It's a small restaurant, larger groups of 4 would have trouble here. Overall the vibe a nice street urban feel, however the music was quite loud to hold a conversation, I recommend sitting close to the ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Don't even think about going anywhere else for ramen   üçúüçúüçúüçú

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Very small menu but excellent Ramens full of flavour. I would definitely recommend a visit to this Ramen house. Ramen is cooked perfectly and the different broths have very distinctive flavours.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Super tasty shoyu ramen that's slightly sweeter than any other I've had before. Defiantly a nice change. The tantan that my wife has was also excellent. The sides we had were also amazing. The octopus was especially tasty, very high class ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: One of the best Ramen places in Manchester. If you go, you have to try the pork Ramen, it's absolutely outstanding. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: All the ramen is made with chicken broth, which is less salty than pork broth. So if you want traditional, salty pork broth, this won't be the place for you. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Small but perfected menu with delicious ramen dishes (pork, chicken and veggie when I visited) that melt in the mouth. Decently priced costing around ¬£14-15 with a drink. Very much recommended.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Pretty nice ramen! Definitely one of the best in Manchester!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Really good ramen, the best I have had outside of Japan in fact! Fantastic and friendly service, additionally the food came out quickly and piping hot. Very good price point for what you are receiving.
Cannot stop thinking about going again for a good ramen fix!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Minimalist seating and decor yet with a calm, homey feel. Attentive, friendly and knowledgeable staff. Menu short but plenty to choose from and the food, wow, it was delicious. If you're after pork bone broth, then this isn't the place for ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Really good ramen and soft serve. Been here twice and Had the shoyu and tantanmen. Shoyu is sweeter than I‚Äôve had in the past but it‚Äôs very refreshing. The tantanmen has the perfect amount of spice to warm up to on a cold day. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
My husband and I walk past every evening on our way to the car and the smell is incredible.
We were celebrating my husband's new job so decided to pop in. Generous ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Service was unfortunate. My order was given to someone who came in 10 minutes after me and my partner had to wait as well as me for 15 minutes for my food, with her food in front of her. No new meal was offered for her while it got cold ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Pretty good ramen. The broth is very good, although wasnt super impressed by the noodles. Will definitely go back though. It had a good friendly atmosphere, and the service was good.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: If a bowl of ramen doesn't make you happy, it's bad ramen. The broth lacked any depth of flavour. Not at all to my liking but the flavour of the pork belly and  hardness of the noodles are on point.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Great food, swift service with very hardworking, attentive and welcoming waiters...
On the other hand the music is way too loud so not recommended if you want to ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Hands down best ramen I've ever had. Great vibe in the place too. Loved the tunes and the service was second to none, especially the very lovely Phillipino guy! We will be back!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Just visited for the first time, seriously impressed.

Didn't try any of the side plates but the Shoyu was absolutely delicious, the ‚Ä¶

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: I never leave reviews for places but felt like these guys seriously deserved it. From an over-critical hospitality way of thinking you can always pinpoint areas restaurants could improve but not here. The service, the food, the atmosphere and the playlist are all perfect. Absolutely mint place.

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Fantastic, the best ramen I've eaten in Manchester. Deeper flavour than shoryu and a healthier portion, limited menu but I think that's what makes it so good.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Friendly service, short but authentic menu and good ramen. Was a little on the small side portion wise but this was ideal for me as I can never manage all the broth at Shoryu!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Great food and customer service

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Very tasty ramen. The sodas are a must.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Fairly poor effort of replicating the Japan iconic food. Literally nothing is right about the ramen served here. And also 2.50 pounds for a small cup of green tea is outrageous. Will never go again

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: One of the best Ramen I ever had! Simply as that! Wonderful! I like the place, the staff, the attitude, the music, and of course the food! WONDERFUL!

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text:
Meh...

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Absolutely delicious! Great quality. I didn‚Äôt really expect this. Well done guys keep like this. This is one of the best place to eat in Manchester and not spend much. Well done well done well done!!!!!!

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Brilliant! Staff are lovely, food has that personal touch, and o got to watch them make my meal which was delicious! Lots of flavour! Couldn't be happier  :)

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Had the chicken ramen and a glass of capsis, very nice though maybe the broth was a bit thick, was still flavoursome.  Will be going back to try the small plates.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: The place offers an awesome range of fresh food. I like dining here. Employees are always super friendly, pricing is convenient and the spot is always well organised.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Everything is delicious. Get the Tan Tan and the veggie Gyoza. :)

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Service was brilliant, nice atmosphere, great location. The crab was surprisingly nice, but a bit overpriced and somehow the ramen didn't hit the spot.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Service was quick and food was good, only downsides were that portion was smaller than similar chains and they only serve chicken ramen as opposed to tonkotsu. Otherwise good.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Delicious Ramen. Great for a quick lunch on your own or with a friend or two. Perfect rainy day comfort food.

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Best ramen in Manchester, 10/10, possibly top in UK, perfect broth and noodles. Great service and venue as well overall would recommend.

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Such an amazing place to eat, welcoming staff, awesome tunes & the ramen is absolute quality üëåalways leave a very full & very happy man.

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Had the Tantanmen and it was amazing! Best ramen I've had in Manchester!

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: First time here, very surprised enjoyed my ramen and chicken, staff very friendly food excellent.  Will be back again.

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Name: Tokyo Ramen
Review Text: Amazing ramen! So so tasty.

Name: Tokyo Ramen

Review Text: I would recommend you to try this place at least for once. They serve authentic ramen noodles, that are extremely delicious, although it was very disappointing to see them have a really small menu.
